Append log messages to a file and stdout as well

appender_tee.Rd

Append log messages to a file and stdout as well

appender_tee(file, append = TRUE)

Arguments

file

path
append

boolean passed to cat defining if the file should be overwritten with the most recent log message instead of appending

Value

function taking lines argument

See also

This is generator function for log_appender, for alternatives, see eg appender_console, appender_file, appender_slack, appender_pushbullet

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • See also
